title: Sharingan Kled & Rinnegan Skaarl
body:
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvKrbw1WoAAsyRR.jpg

Riot, make it happen. 

...and since skaarls immortal, he gets the rinnegan.

replies.body: The angles are perfect. It also reminds me of a Yordle version of Darius
I'd rather we stayed away from any mainstream shounen Anime garbage tropes and clich√©s such as 'MY EYE GIVES ME SUPERPOWERS'.
makes as much sense as turning him into Dracula for halloween
Me and my brother just agreed on the same thing. If Riot can shitpost their own Champion, Why Can't I?

Let's see what we got here

* random ass concept that makes no sense
* low effort photoshop
* bizarre cropping of the image
* concept wtf


shitposting from the 36th plane of existance
